interests.CanAdd: Kana iwe usingakwanisi kuwana zvauri kutsvaga, unogona kuwedzera chido chitsva pasi:

chat.flaggedForAdminReview: Mharidzo yakagadzirirwa kuongororwa admin. Tora zvakare kuti urege kushandura.
chat.closeChatConfirm: Unonyatsoziva here kuti unoda kuvhara iyi mharidzo?

dialog.photoInstruction: Kana munhu akaongorora QR code yako iri mberi kwako, tora mufananidzo wavo
dialog.title: Kumbira

mobile.alert: Kukokwa kunotumirwa kubva kunhamba yedu, iyo shamwari dzako dzisati dzaziva. Dzokorora nemagwaro matsva kuitira kuti vazive kukokwa kwakabva kwamuri, vachivakumbira kuti vakanise kubatanidza.
mobile.confirm: Kukokwa kunotumirwa kubva kunhamba yedu, iyo shamwari dzako dzisati dzaziva. Ungada here kutevera nemashoko ekukurumidza kuti uvazivise kuti kukokwa kwakabva kwauri, uchivakumbira kuti vanyanise hukama.
mobile.check: Hei, ndangokutumira kukoka kune {{app}} app. Ndapota chengetedza sms yako uye chenganisa chibatanidza!

email.alert: Kukokwa kunotumirwa kubva kunzvimbo yedu, iyo shamwari dzako dzisati dzaziva. Dzokorora nemagwaro matsva kuitira kuti vazive kukokwa kwakabva kwamuri, vachivakumbira kuti vakanise kubatanidza.
email.confirm: Kukokwa kunotumirwa kubva kunzvimbo yedu, iyo shamwari dzako dzisati dzaziva. Ungada here kutevera nemashoko ekukurumidza kuti uvazivise kuti kukokwa kwakabva kwauri, uchivakumbira kuti vanyanise hukama.
email.subject: Wakawana kukokwa here?
email.body: Hei, ndangokutumira kukoka kune {{app}} app. Ndapota chengetedza email yako uye chengetedza chibatanidzi mukati maro!
